mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basis_tb_user_job ( USER_ID, JOB_ID, NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, TEL, WORK_YEAR, EDUCATION, REMARK, TYPE, STATE, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{jobId}, #{name}, #{sex}, STR_TO_DATE(#{birthday}, '%Y-%m-%d'), #{tel}, #{workYear}, #{education}, #{remark}, #{type}, 'U', NOW(), #{modifyUser}, NOW(), #{modifyUser} )
mapper.select:
SELECT t.`USER_JOB_ID` AS userJobId, t.user_id AS userId, t.job_id AS jobId, t.`NAME`, t.`SEX`, DATE_FORMAT(t.`BIRTHDAY`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthday, t.`TEL`, t.`WORK_YEAR` AS workYear, t.`EDUCATION`, t.`REMARK`, t.`TYPE`, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate FROM basis_tb_user_job t WHERE t.state = 'U'
AND t.type = #{type}
AND t.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY `CREATE_DATE` DESC
AND t.job_id = #{jobId} ORDER BY `CREATE_DATE` ASC

SELECT t.`USER_JOB_ID` AS userJobId, t.user_id AS userId, t.`NAME`, t.`SEX`, DATE_FORMAT(t.`BIRTHDAY`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS birthday, t.`TEL`, t.`WORK_YEAR` AS workYear, t.`EDUCATION`, t.`REMARK`, t.`TYPE`, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createDate FROM basis_tb_user_job t WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.job_id = #{jobId} AND t.user_job_id = #{userJobId}
